system.type: Xenos char, Individual willing to perform service, Human Patron.
system.descriptor: A Xenos is permently marked to show they serve the Imperium of Man, as long as they are vouched for by a human patron, they are much less likely to be attacked on sight while on Imperial Worlds and Stations.
system.uses: Xenos gains Sanctioned Xenos Trait. If Xenos has a Human Patron, after locating a suitable individual to perform the service, the Xenos undergoes a thorough interview and an Acqusition Test of Very Rare level must be passed (no effect from Scale or Quality), mark must be shown visibly.
